name: Sparks of solidarity
description:
Sparks of solidarity

Is a little action, jump and run, created for the 'stay safe'-game jam in 48h.

You try to help at times, where it is really needed, so you begin your adventure in the world of solidarity. Fight enemies and collect valuable items to stop the spread of the corona-virus.

If you found the cake and its rightful owner, you have beaten the game. I had no time for more content sry. I hope you liked it ;D.

A controller is the best way to play this game "At least for me", but you can use a mouse and keyboard as well.

Move with the left stick or A and D

Jump with the A button or Space

Interact with the B button or E

Spray(After you found the item) with the X button or LeftMouse. If you hold your LeftStick up or press W while spraying, you spray up.
